text: rājāv strīkaḷēāṭ cēādiccu: "yūsuphine vaśappeṭuttān śramiccappēāḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe anubhavamentāyirunnu?” avar paṟaññu: "mahatvaṁ allāhuvinu tanne. yūsuphineppaṟṟi mēāśamāyateānnuṁ ñaṅṅaḷkkaṟiyilla.” prabhuvinṟe patni paṟaññu: "ippēāḷ satyaṁ veḷippeṭṭirikkunnu. ñān addēhatte vaśappeṭuttān svayaṁ śramikkukayāyirunnu. tīrccayāyuṁ addēhaṁ satyavānāṇ.”
